comments.message: McDonald's Singapore. I'lll like to give credits to the folks at Boat Quay branch. Despite the long queue, i only waited for less than 10 minutes. Great efficiency and keep up the good work! Thank you for the National Breakfast day. It just feels kind of nice and it has nothing to do with money.

Would like to acknowledge the pleasant service your staff (the man in this picture) has provided me with. Even though I had a brief conversation with him I could see how dedicated he is in his job. Kudos! Dear Saiful, your smile brightened up my day :) Keep doing what you've been doing.

My family and I went to AMK's McDonalds and would like to acknowledge the Outstanding service (the man in this picture) with full pleasant smile to us!. Mr Saiful was doing the incredible job and make us happy all day! Thumbs up! :D
Gotten mine already and thanks for the giveaway!
some parents are a shame to their kids.bring their kids to take so many egg mc muffins(more than 20 of them) at the bedok interchange macdonalds.

Good service and efficient. The staff smile with fully brightened up the customers day including myself!. Good example to all the staffs. Waiting time wasn't that long and able to order in time. Good job McDonalds!
Freebies are nice, but parents should take the chance and teach kids whats proper behavior, and spirit of queueing up properly and not grabbing more than necessary...

Thanks McDonalds for the free Egg McMuffin! Really appreciate it! Just a suggestion, maybe management can come up with a solution and limiting each customer to 1 burger instead of letting their 'kids' rejoin the queue to 'collect' more burgers.

6.post_text: For those of you who want to take a last look at our KAP restaurant, we’ll be closing at midnight tonight! See you there! :)

comments.message: Dear all, thanks for your interest! :) To clarify, each of our participating restaurants will be giving away 1000 free Egg McMuffins during breakfast hours on a first-come, first-served basis. The following stores will not be participating: KKH Hospital, Yew Tee (including Yew Tee Kiosk), Tampines Interchange Kiosk, Lucky Chinatown, Clementi Avenue 3, Changi Airport T2 Transit and Science Centre Singapore.
Can you give these free breakfast to the homes and needy? They need them more than anyone who has a fb account.
McDonald's Singapore U should have all day breakfast once a week! I am more interested to eat pancakes / muffins at dinner time rather than before 11am /12pm XD

Sam Tan  
Free Egg McMuffin® giveaway is available from 6am to 11am on 17 March 2014 in a limited quantity only, while stock lasts. Free Egg McMuffin® giveaway is available from 7am to 11am at Compass Point and Clifford Centre. Redemption is valid at participating McDonald’s outlets. The following stores are not participating in National Breakfast Day: KK Hospital, Yew Tee Main & Kiosk, Tampines Interchange Kiosk, Lucky Chinatown, Clementi Avenue 3, Changi Airport T2 Transit, and Singapore Science Centre. Redemption is based on presentation of valid original coupon. Coupon will only be handed out at store on 17 March 2014. Only one redemption per coupon per customer is allowed.

7.post_text: National Breakfast Day returns to Singapore on 17 March and its set to be bigger and even better! More than 100,000 free Egg McMuffins will be given away, and for the first time ever, we’ll be serving breakfast till 6pm! Who’s up for some hotcakes at teatime? ;)

8.post_text: A huge thank you to all our customers for the years of support at our KAP restaurant! With the building slated for redevelopment, our last day here will be on 16 March, where we’ll be open till midnight. While we are sad to leave, we’re still serving up the McDonald’s experience you’ve grown to love through our restaurants at Alocassia and Beauty World!

comments.message: None of the above too. I would rather go to Wendy's or Popeyes! The only good thing about Mcdonalds is your breakfast items. Mcdonalds, you just like to discontinue all the things that I like, and replace them with your current boring menu!
